name: Spread
description: A drama centered on a serial womanizer and his jilted lover.
keywords: womanizer,shaving pubic hair,pick up artist,female nudity,unfaithful wife

review.author: cbuusse
review.heading: Better than expected
review.reviewBody: Not much of a Kutcher fan here, so obviously my expectations for this movie were quite low to begin with. I have to admit I was a little surprised to find that I actually enjoyed the plot and that it's apparently more than just nudity, once you get underneath that layer. Ironically one of those movies that make you rethink parts of your own life, and what really matters. I am a sucker for happy, sappy endings, but in its own way I think this ended perfectly.
